presentation.title: Hiking trails
presentation.headline: Hiking trails - discover the attractions of our area
presentation.description: From light walks among heritage buildings and old churches to hiking trails along lakes, nature attractions and villages

specificArticles.textContent:
Our village is surrounded by mountains, valleys, old churches, heritage buildings and ancient galleries. So, If you come to Ro»ôia, don't visit just the museum and the local store, because the area has much more to offer. Check the trails below and find the ones you like, based on the touristic attractions you would like to see.
The maps of the trails are done in google maps, so you can zoom in, see them in satellite mode or access them from any device. Under each trail you'll find indications estimated by us (round trip distance, duration). The indications within the map are being estimated by google.
